channel.title: Maging npc
channel.description:
i see on some servers that u can make it so u can't mage an npc that u need a level for
like u need say 10 slayer to attack the npc but u can mage it anyway at lv 1
how can i get it so u can't mage it at lv 1 untill u have 10 slayer?

item.title: Maging npc
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

my playerconfig??

the npc level req is in my client.java
and how would the code look for that
i know i have to add something to the req to stop magic attack til ur at the lv but what go i put in?

Read full topic

item.title: Maging npc
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Change in your Playerconfig And set it to that Npc with that level then they can’t attack it.

Read full topic
